mapper.insert:
SELECT recipe_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO recipe(recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, ingredient, rdate, mname, gname, time, difficulty) VALUES(#{recipeno}, #{memberno}, #{itemno}, #{title}, #{article}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, #{ingredient}, sysdate, #{mname}, #{gname}, #{time}, #{difficulty})
mapper.select: SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, gname, time, difficulty FROM recipe ORDER BY recipeno DESC

SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, gname, time, difficulty FROM recipe WHERE itemno=#{itemno} ORDER BY recipeno DESC

SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, gname, time, difficulty FROM recipe WHERE recipeno = #{recipeno}

SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, gname, time, difficulty FROM recipe
WHERE itemno=#{itemno}
WHERE itemno=#{itemno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(article) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY recipeno DESC
SELECT recipeno, title, recom, rdate FROM recipe ORDER BY recom DESC, rdate DESC

SELECT p.recipeno, p.memberno, p.itemno, p.title, p.article, p.recom, p.cnt, p.replycnt, p.passwd, p.word, p.rdate, p.file1,p.file1saved, p.thumb1, p.size1, p.youtube, p.ingredient, p.review, p.star, p.mname FROM recipe p inner join recom c on p.recipeno = c.recipeno WHERE c.memberno = #{memberno } ORDER BY c.rdate DESC

SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname,r FROM ( SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY recom DESC) AS r FROM recipe ORDER BY recom DESC ) WHERE 5 >= r

SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, r FROM ( SELECT recipeno, memberno, itemno, title, article, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1,file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, ingredient, review, star, mname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY recom DESC) AS r FROM recipe ORDER BY rdate DESC
) WHERE 5 >= r
